Content: Hello everyone, I am newer to the motorcycle scene and posted a question several years ago about my bike. Someone else just commented on my post from years ago and I cannot respond without posting an introduction thread and for some reason I also had to make a new account (it wouldnt verify my email). I rode a 2003 Triumph Speed Four but have unfortunately since sold it due to a change of plans in life. Nice to be apart of this forum! Now let me help this man! LOL
